title: Lulu Waveclear
body:
Why was this completely destroyed?

Meanwhile Zed and Azir are as oppressive as ever 

The 0.7 ratio buff was not even carried over

You say you like Lulu in all lanes, but I feel that is a blatant lie.

replies.body: In the end we thought that the base stats increase and buff on W would be enough to compensate solo lane Lulu. We recognized her wave clearing would be substantially weaker, but forcing her to interact more with her auto-attacks seemed reasonable, given that she had access to more spells (via mana) and moved a bit faster.  We'll be monitoring her closely and react if she needs further tuning.

Because they want Lulu to fit in more as a support than as a mid/top laner. Honestly she's pretty boring to play against if she goes in a solo lane. She can wave clear easily and then she's got enough shields to stop whatever damage you hit her with.

What are you talking about? They have wanted to slow her wave clear down for a long time. This is the change they should have made back in like 6.8? I think it was. Not the other nerfs they did to her. Zed has below a 50% win rate and honestly isn't even all that ban worthy, not to mention the number of counters to him.
well please stop the nerfs at this at least
